name: Reconfig

Headline: Next generation organization design tools
ShortDescription: Reconfig AS is a Norwegian software company developing cloud solutions for organization design. With Reconfig technology, you can map the information flow of your company, analyze your work processes and design your organizational structure to achieve the best possible fit between intended and actual work processes.
enhanced_description: Reconfig is a cloud-based software solution for organization design, developed by a Norwegian company. It originated in 2016 from a cross-disciplinary effort combining organization theory, business strategy, and computer science, addressing a market gap for dedicated data collection and analysis tools in complex Organization Design projects. The first web-based version (Reconfig 1.0) was launched in 2019, with Reconfig 2.0 following in December 2022, incorporating feedback from clients and partners worldwide. The technology allows users to map information flow, analyze work processes, and design organizational structures to achieve the best possible fit between intended and actual work. Through a global network of independent partners, Reconfig supports leaders and consultants worldwide in improving organizational performance across diverse industries and governmental sectors. Additionally, Reconfig offers Organization Design training, workshops, and mentoring to equip participants with the necessary knowledge and skills.
